domains.name: Organizations
domains.purpose: Manage organizations (workspaces), their metadata, membership and access control.

domains.name: Products
domains.purpose: Create and configure products within an organization, manage product-level settings, baselines and product context snapshots.

domains.name: Connectors (Sources & Channels)
domains.purpose: Configure external data sources (e.g., GitHub) and channels, manage connections and synchronization status for products.

domains.name: Timeline / Events / Interpretation
domains.purpose: Ingest raw events from connected sources, run interpretation to surface product-relevant events and provide a timeline/insights view.

domains.name: Agents & AI Inference
domains.purpose: Run autonomous agents and AI-powered tasks (feature extraction, domain mapping, timeline interpretation), track agent runs and AI usage/inference logs.

domains.name: Auth & Users
domains.purpose: User authentication, account management and user-level preferences used by the app (last active org/product, access tracking).

capabilities.description: Request and complete password resets using emailed OTPs.
capabilities.name: Reset Password

capabilities.description: Sign up users with email/OTP verification and code entry.
capabilities.name: Register with Verification

capabilities.description: Sign in users via email/password or social OAuth providers.
capabilities.name: Authenticate Users

capabilities.description: Manually send prompts, stream responses and inspect AI usage for testing.
capabilities.name: Test AI Agents

capabilities.description: Aggregate product and source-level context for agent inferences.
capabilities.name: Build Product and Source Context

capabilities.description: Extract product features, map domains and classify surface signals.
capabilities.name: Generate Feature Maps and Domain Taxonomy

capabilities.description: Call LLM providers with adapters and capture inference telemetry.
capabilities.name: LLM Inference Pipeline

capabilities.description: Read AI inference logs and let users rate inference outputs.
capabilities.name: Rate AI Inferences

capabilities.description: Create, append steps, query and export agent run traces.
capabilities.name: Manage Agent Runs

capabilities.description: Convert raw events into product-relevant interpreted narratives.
capabilities.name: Interpret Timeline Events

capabilities.description: Display and filter interpreted timeline events and details.
capabilities.name: View Timeline

capabilities.description: Install GitHub connector, handle OAuth, fetch repos and ingest events.
capabilities.name: Integrate GitHub

capabilities.description: Add, list and manage external connections for a product.
capabilities.name: Configure Connectors

capabilities.description: View and update domain mappings for a product.
capabilities.name: Map Product Domains

capabilities.description: View and act on product context snapshots (publish, inspect).
capabilities.name: Manage Product Context Snapshots

capabilities.description: Edit baseline settings or use a guided wizard for setup.
capabilities.name: Configure Product Baseline

capabilities.description: View and manage product members, including leaving a product.
capabilities.name: Manage Product Members

capabilities.description: List, view and switch the active product context.
capabilities.name: Browse and Switch Products

capabilities.description: Delete a product with confirmation and warnings.
capabilities.name: Delete Product

capabilities.description: Create a new product within an organization using a form-based flow.
capabilities.name: Create Product

capabilities.description: List accessible organizations and switch the active organization.
capabilities.name: Browse and Switch Organizations

capabilities.description: Allow a user to leave an organization (self-removal flow).
capabilities.name: Leave Organization

capabilities.description: Transfer ownership from one member to another with role swaps.
capabilities.name: Transfer Organization Ownership

capabilities.description: List, invite/add, remove members and change member roles.
capabilities.name: Manage Organization Members

capabilities.description: Delete a non-personal organization (owner-only) via confirmation flow.
capabilities.name: Delete Organization

capabilities.description: Update organization metadata with permission checks.
capabilities.name: Update Organization

capabilities.description: Create a new organization, enforce plan and slug rules, and add the owner.
capabilities.name: Create Organization

features.description: Backend email provider and templates used to send password reset emails/OTPs to users (supports reset-password flows).
features.name: Password Reset Email Provider

features.description: Backend email provider that generates short numeric verification tokens and sends them via the Resend API for account verification flows.
features.name: Resend OTP Email Provider

features.description: Reusable UI form for entering verification/OTP codes used across signup verification and password reset flows.
features.name: Verification Code Entry

features.description: Full UI flow enabling users to request a password reset and submit verification codes to set a new password.
features.name: Password Reset Flow

features.description: UI component exposing social authentication options (OAuth providers) as part of sign-in/sign-up flows.
features.name: Social Login Buttons

features.description: Sign-up flow that includes verification (email/OTP) to confirm new accounts before full access is granted.
features.name: Sign Up with Verification

features.description: UI form for users to sign in with email/password or other configured auth methods.
features.name: Sign In Form

features.description: Service/agent that classifies surfaces and maps signals from product artifacts into structured surface signals/taxonomy for downstream analysis.
features.name: Surface Signal Mapper

features.description: Agent that creates a feature map of a product (maps features to taxonomy/domain), producing structured feature data used by UI and other agents.
features.name: Feature Map Agent

features.description: Simple test/demo agent used by the AI Test Panel for manual testing and smoke checks of agent interactions and streaming.
features.name: Hello World Agent (test)

features.description: Agent that builds source-level context (repository/file-level content) used by other agents to answer questions about code or product sources.
features.name: Source Context Agent

features.description: Agent that constructs product context (knowledge about a product) by aggregating product-specific sources and metadata to provide context to inference calls and other agents.
features.name: Product Context Agent

features.description: Agent that interprets timelines and contextualizes events (timeline interpretation pipeline). Used to convert timeline data into structured context for downstream agents/features.
features.name: Timeline Context Interpreter Agent

features.description: Agent and supporting code that maps repository and product data into domain taxonomy (domain mapper/orchestrator). Produces domain maps and taxonomy data used for domain discovery and product mapping.
features.name: Domain Mapping Agent

features.description: Agent that extracts product/domain features from source (taxonomy/feature extraction pipeline). Implements logic to analyze sources and produce feature maps/taxonomies used by other systems.
features.name: Feature Extraction Agent

features.description: Backend adapters and port abstraction for calling LLM providers (OpenAI, Anthropic), prompts library and telemetry/config for inference calls. Implements provider-specific request/response handling and usage telemetry capture.
features.name: LLM Adapter & Inference Pipeline

features.description: Backend queries and mutations to read inference log ratings and to let users rate AI inferences (by product+agent+context or by inference id). Enforces agent telemetry config and access checks.
features.name: AI Inference Logs & Rating

features.description: Backend API to create and manage agent runs: create runs, append step entries, finish runs, query runs (single and lists by use case), export an expanded run trace (including stored output files), and cleanup old runs.
features.name: Agent Run Lifecycle & Traces

features.description: Internal UI to send prompts to agents (supports streaming), view conversation threads, and show recent AI usage/metrics for the ai_test use case. Lets users reset threads and inspect message history.
features.name: AI Test Panel

features.description: Supporting backend agent actions invoked by the interpretation pipeline, including source-context classification and feature-map refresh flows (actions implemented in agents/actions.ts). These prepare context & feature data used during interpretation.
features.name: Agent Support Actions (classification / feature-map)

features.description: Agent implementation that provides the interpretation skill/logic used to convert raw event buckets into product-relevant narratives. Invoked by the interpretation pipeline to produce the InterpretationOutput (narratives, inferred features, focus areas, impact, inference logs).
features.name: Timeline Context Interpreter Agent

features.description: Backend queries and mutations to manage raw events lifecycle: fetch pending or product raw events, fetch by ids, mark raw events processed, and delete interpreted events for a product. Supports ingestion lifecycle and the interpretation pipeline.
features.name: Raw Events Management

features.description: Core backend action that drives interpretation: loads pending/raw events, buckets them by cadence, orchestrates agent actions to interpret bucket(s), writes interpreted events, records agentRun steps and finalizes runs. Implements the end-to-end pipeline that converts raw events into surfaced interpreted events.
features.name: Interpretation Pipeline

features.description: Backend API surface for listing timeline items and fetching timeline/interpreted-event details used by the webapp. (entrypoint file provides queries/actions for timeline consumption).
features.name: Timeline Events API

features.description: UI for filtering timeline/events (kinds, dates, tags, cadence/impact filters). Provides controls used to refine the timeline view.
features.name: Timeline Filters

features.description: UI list that displays interpreted timeline events with date, impact, summary and badges for features/fixes/improvements. Supports loading and empty states, selection (scroll-into-view) and summary display.
features.name: Timeline List

features.description: Reusable helper functions for GitHub agent tools (authentication helpers, request helpers, pagination, etc.).
features.name: GitHub helpers (agent utilities)

features.description: Agent/tool to perform code search against GitHub repositories (used for repo analysis and indexing during syncs).
features.name: GitHub search code tool

features.description: Agent/tool to read file contents from GitHub (used to ingest code/content during syncs and repo analysis).
features.name: GitHub read file tool

features.description: Agent/tool to list files in a GitHub repository path (used by sync, repo analysis and ingestion flows).
features.name: GitHub list files tool

features.description: Agent/tool to list directories in a GitHub repository (used by backend sync/analysis flows).
features.name: GitHub list directories tool

features.description: Backend implementation for the GitHub connector: OAuth install flow, handling app callbacks, storing/updating credentials, fetching installation tokens, fetching repo structure summaries, inserting raw events, and orchestrating sync handlers for a GitHub connection.
features.name: GitHub Connector (backend)

features.description: Backend queries & mutations for managing connections and connector types: list connector types, list connections by product, create connections (admin-only), update connection status, remove connection, update credentials after OAuth, retrieve connection details, and update sync state. Also seeds initial connector types.
features.name: Connections Service / API

features.description: UI component that renders an individual connection with details and inline actions (configure, disconnect, trigger sync, view status/errors).
features.name: Connection Card / Item

features.description: UI list view that displays all connections for a product, including connector type, status, last sync time and actions to manage each connection.
features.name: Connections List

features.description: UI flow/dialog to create a new connector connection for a product (select connector type, enter config, start OAuth flows). Visible to product admins to add external sources/channels.
features.name: Add Connection Dialog

features.description: Dialog that allows a user to leave a product (self-removal flow with confirmation).
features.name: Leave Product

features.description: UI to view and manage members of a product (list roles, changes, possibly invite/role changes).
features.name: Product Members Management

features.description: UI card to view and update domain mapping information for a product (visualizes domain map and provides update actions).
features.name: Domain Map Card

features.description: Guided multi-step wizard to help users create or update a product baseline (onboarding/config flow).
features.name: Baseline Setup Wizard

features.description: Editor interface to configure and edit a product's baseline settings and defaults.
features.name: Baseline Editor

features.description: Displays product context snapshot details and exposes actions related to product context snapshots (e.g. publish snapshot).
features.name: Product Context Snapshot Card

features.description: Switcher UI component that lets users change the current active product/context across the application.
features.name: Product Switcher

features.description: Visual card used across the UI to present a product summary (used in lists and selection flows).
features.name: Product Card

features.description: List/table view that displays products the user can access, with actions to open, manage or select a product.
features.name: Product List View

features.description: Confirmation dialog to delete a product (handles confirmation, warnings and triggers delete action).
features.name: Delete Product

features.description: Form UI to create a new product within an organization (collects product name, initial settings and triggers creation).
features.name: Create Product

features.description: Query returning the user's organizations with extra metadata (role, joinedAt, memberCount) and ordering (personal first), used to populate richer organization lists.
features.name: Get User Organizations With Details (backend)

features.description: Internal mutation used by auth callback to automatically create a personal 'free' organization for a new user, ensuring unique slug and adding owner membership. Internal API (not called directly by UI).
features.name: Create Personal Organization (internal backend)

features.description: Query that returns recently accessed organizations for the authenticated user (based on membership.lastAccessAt), limited to top N for quick switching.
features.name: Get Recent Organizations (backend)

features.description: Mutation to transfer organization ownership to another member (owner-only), swap roles (old owner -> admin, new owner -> owner) and validate constraints (no personal org transfers, cannot transfer to self).
features.name: Transfer Ownership (backend)

features.description: Mutation to delete an organization (owner only), prevent deleting personal orgs, and cascade-delete members.
features.name: Delete Organization (backend)

features.description: Mutation to change a member's role (admin/member) with permission checks and prevention of changing owner role.
features.name: Update Member Role (backend)

features.description: Mutation to remove a member from an organization with permission checks (owner/admin or self-removal) and cascade deletion of product memberships for that user.
features.name: Remove Member (backend)

features.description: Mutation to add/invite a member by email to an organization, validate requester permissions (owner/admin), check plan member limits, find user by email and insert organizationMembers.
features.name: Add Member (backend)

features.description: Mutation to update organization metadata (name, description) with permission checks (owner/admin).
features.name: Update Organization (backend)

features.description: Mutation to create a new organization (personal or professional), enforce plan rules, ensure slug uniqueness, and add the creator as owner in organizationMembers.
features.name: Create Organization (backend)

features.description: Query to determine whether the authenticated user can create a new organization and the reason if not.
features.name: Can Create Organization (backend)

features.description: Query to obtain the personal (auto-created) organization associated with the authenticated user.
features.name: Get Personal Organization (backend)

features.description: Query to list members of an organization including user info for each member.
features.name: Get Organization Members (backend)

features.description: Query that returns organizations where the authenticated user is a member, including role and joinedAt.
features.name: Get User Organizations (backend)

features.description: Query that fetches an organization by slug and verifies the requesting user's membership and role; returns organization with userRole and memberCount.
features.name: Get Organization By Slug (backend)

features.description: Query that returns all organizations (public listing).
features.name: List Organizations (backend)

features.description: Switcher UI (probably in header) that shows recent or accessible organizations and allows switching the active organization/session.
features.name: Organization Switcher (UI)

features.description: UI to list organizations the user can access or browse (uses org-card for visual items).
features.name: Organization List / Directory (UI)

features.description: Members management UI: list members, view roles, invite/add members by email, remove members and change roles (admin/member). Likely contains invitation input and role controls.
features.name: Organization Members Management (UI)

features.description: Dialog UI used by the owner to transfer organization ownership to another member (select member, confirm transfer).
features.name: Transfer Ownership (UI)

features.description: Dialog that lets a user leave an organization (self-removal flow).
features.name: Leave Organization (UI)

features.description: Dialog UI that allows an organization owner to delete a non-personal organization (confirmation flow).
features.name: Delete Organization (UI)

features.description: Form UI to create a new organization (personal or professional) including name, slug, description and plan selection for professional orgs.
features.name: Create Organization (UI)
